"
No "reporting" involved but prepping, transcribing and editing this took massive. amounts. of. time. I was on vacation with my family when this came out and they were all super impressed. I then realized that they think I make pretty decent money as a writer. When I told them the $50 figure it was like the curtain on the tabernacle ripped, they realized there is no God and space is vast, empty and cruel. They honestly thought I was typing away and checks were rolling in and it was all so jolly and nice. I felt a little bit bad for them. And really embarrassed because it's not my fault that no one pays but somehow I felt that when they learned the truth they didn't think I was a "real" writer any more, when the moment before they had basking in the reflected glory of having a Writer in the family. God, this is sad. "
